injections.injections.Injections¶

class injections.injections.Injections(load_injections=None, generator_injections=None)¶

Bases: _DataLoaderFactory

Set of injection objects

Parameters:

  • load_injections (List, optional) – List of load injection objects to represent loads, defaults to None

  • generator_injections (List, optional) – List of injection objects to represent generators, defaults to None

__init__(load_injections=None, generator_injections=None)¶

Methods

__init__([load_injections, generator_injections])

load(data_loader_name, directory)

Loads the injection data using the specified data_loader_name from the specified directory

to_dataframe()

Converts the injections to a pandas dataframe
load(data_loader_name, directory)¶

Loads the injection data using the specified data_loader_name from the specified directory

Parameters:

  • data_loader_name (string) – File type to load the data from (csv)

  • directory (string) – relative path (from the folder where the code is run) to the directory containing the injection data

to_dataframe()¶

Converts the injections to a pandas dataframe

Returns:

Injection data as a dictionary of pandas dataframes named “load” and “generator”

Return type:

Dictionary of pandas dataframes
